H0.text: Espiritu Santo is the largest island of which island republic. Solomon Islands

H3.text: Espiritu Santo is the largest island of which island republic. Vanatu

A4.text: The fourteen of Vanuatu's islands that have surface areas of more than 100 square kilometres (39 sq mi) are, from largest to smallest: Espiritu Santo, Malakula, Efate...
